utterance: <speak>Within the area of, physical and chemical changes, please select a topic by clicking on a picture below.</speak>
<speak>Below are some variables that might affect the amount of crystal growth on a string in water. you can test one of these variables in your experiment</speak>
<speak>Water temperature, The type of crystals, The initial amount of crystals on the string, and the type of string</speak>
<speak>Here are all of the materials that may be necessary for this experiment, a glass jar, a calendar, a pencil, string, distilled water, crystals and a digital scale</speak>
<speak>We will mix a crystal salt or sugar in water so it dissolves</speak>
<speak>We will continue to add the crystals and mix until no more crystals can be dissolved in the water, this is the saturation point</speak>
<speak>Then we will put a string in the water</speak>
<speak>We can measure the weight of the crystal growth after two weeks</speak>
<speak>Push the button in the middle of the screen to see how this experiment works</speak>

<speak>In this experiment, there are only four things we can change, any of these might make a difference in the amount of crystal growth on a string in water, these are the four variables you can test in this experiment, the water temperature which can be cool</speak>
<speak>The type of crystal which can be salt</speak>
<speak>Or brown sugar might make a difference</speak>
<speak>The initial amount of crystals on the string which can be none</speak>
<speak>And the type of string which can be twine</speak>
<speak>Or yarn, this might also make a difference</speak>
<speak>Select the variable you would like to test</speak>
<speak>This variable is the independent variable of your experiment</speak>
<speak>The research question you have chosen is</speak>
<speak>Does the water temperature affect the weight of the crystal growth on a string in water after two weeks?</speak>
<speak>OK!, you have chosen as your Research Question, does the water temperature affect the weight of the crystal growth on the string in water after two weeks?</speak>

<speak>The research question you have chosen is, does the initial amount of crystals on the string affect the weight of the crystal growth on a string in water after two weeks?</speak>

<speak>The research question you have chosen is, does the type of string affect the weight of the crystal growth on a string in water after two weeks?</speak>
